title: Wonder birds of Australia
creator_credit: Harold J. Pollock and Bank of New South Wales
brief_description: Studies the unique characteristics of Australian birds including distinctive bird calls, flight sequences and the variety of parrots and honeyeaters. Illustrates the unique behaviour of the cassowary, bower bird, mallee fowl, scrub turkey and the lyrebird. Narrated by John Dease.
creator_credit_for_label: Harold J. Pollock and Bank of New South Wales
